# Preparing the data
```{r}
# install.packages('ggplot2',dependencies = T)
# Loading libraries
#update.packages(checkBuilt = T,ask = F)
library(ggplot2)

#Importing the data
data_dir <- '/Volumes/PK/'
filename <- 'FC_cfs_1_15082016.csv'
ds <- read.csv(paste(data_dir,filename,sep=""))
head(ds)
str(ds) #show structure of dataframe
ds$SubjectID
# Non-blank trials:
nonBlank <- ds[ds$SentenceID<31,]
# Removing the outliers:
outT <- 2.5
cds <- nonBlank
cds <- cds[cds$ST>(mean(nonBlank$ST)-outT*sd(nonBlank$ST)),]
cds <- cds[cds$ST<(mean(nonBlank$ST)+outT*sd(nonBlank$ST)),]
```

# Plots
## Individual plots 
```{r}
#ggplot(data=nonBlank[nonBlank$CueValid==1,], aes(x=factor(Familiar), y=ST, colour=factor(Congruent))) + geom_boxplot()
#ggplot(data=nonBlank[nonBlank$CueValid==0,], aes(x=factor(Familiar), y=ST, colour=factor(Congruent))) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(data=cds[cds$CueValid==1,], aes(x=factor(Familiar), y=ST, colour=factor(Congruent))) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(data=cds[cds$CueValid==0,], aes(x=factor(Familiar), y=ST, colour=factor(Congruent))) + geom_boxplot()
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
